name: Primordial (itch) (Yarde, Aleskalan)
description:
Welcome to Primordial!

Try your skills in a simple real-time strategy game where you lead your camp toward progress and civilization. Find a balance between collecting resources, feeding your people, and building and protecting from wildlife.

Your goal is to develop your camp into a village. 

Collect wood, stone, and berries. Feed your people and defend them from wildlife. Start a fire to scare the wildlife and build walls to protect your people.

Upgrade your buildings to win!

A game made, by team of two:

  • Dawid Kaluża - programmer
  • Aleksandra Fajlert - artist (open for work)
